Hello SAP.

We develop contextual decision maker and influencer account maps of your most valuable clients and prospects.

Tell Me More

Your Toolkit for Sales & Marketing Insight

Hello there, at Unrival we've been helping SAP for over 2 years in mapping key accounts across EMEA. This has been about helping your colleagues build new relationships, find new opportunities and navigate the complex landscape of SAP clients and prospects.

Who to talk to

We identify decision makers and the people who influence their thoughts (both internal and external). We help to provide context on what these people are thinking.

What to say

Talk to targets about their pains and passions, rather than products.

How to reach them

What channels do these people spend time on? What's the best way to reach them digitally. Build a very strong social selling programme based on insight.

The value Unrival brings to SAP.

In this video, see Mark van Heijningen, Edyta Malesza-Malatrat and Shane Finlay talk about working with Unrival and the challenges that we have helped them to solve at SAP.

SAP Case Study - Mapping LoB Stakeholders

Examples of what we do

Account Stakeholder Map

Uncovering the pains, priorities, motivations and interests of target individuals. Know what they are thinking.

Client Case Study – FinTech – Card Acquisition

Mapping Decision Makers and Influencers in Spotify

Brief: "We want to win Spotify as a client, but unsure where to start or who to talk to. Our focus is on owning the payment gateway between Spotify Free, and Spotify Premium".

Spotify - Influencer Circle

Understanding Pains, Priorities, Motivations and Interests.

In-Depth research into an individual to understand their challenges, and how they work with other stakeholders in their business.

Cloud Signals in Dixons Carphone Group

Uncover which technology/cloud platforms are being utilised across the group.

This targeted project was to establish the business opportunity for our client. Helping them to identify what 'cloud signals' existed in the account, and who they should initially talk to.
